battle_traits.name: Ethersea Voyagers
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly regiment led by an Idoneth Deepkin Hero. No units in that regiment can have already been deployed.
battle_traits.effect: Set up those units in reserve travelling the ethersea. They have now been deployed.

battle_traits.name: Tides of Death
battle_traits.effect:
A different effect applies to friendly Idoneth Deepkin units each battle round, as shown below. For the fifth battle round onwards, repeat the sequence, starting with ‘Low Tide’.

Battle Round 1:
Low Tide: For the rest of the battle round, subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit and subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit if it did not use any Charge abilities this turn.

Battle Round 2:
Flood Tide: For the rest of the battle round, this unit can use a Run ability and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn.

Battle Round 3:
High Tide: For the rest of the battle round, this unit has Strike-first.

Battle Round 4:
Ebb Tide: For the rest of the battle round, this unit can use a Retreat ability and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn. In addition, for the rest of the battle round, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by Retreat abilities.

battle_traits.name: Raiders from the Deep
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin unit that is travelling the ethersea to use this ability.
battle_traits.effect: Set up that unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Akhelian Beastmasters.name: Ferocious Predators
Akhelian Beastmasters.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made with Companion weapons by friendly Akhelian units.

Isharann Council.name: Wisdom of the Deep
Isharann Council.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls, Isharann ritual rolls and lurelight rolls for friendly Isharann units while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly Isharann units.

Namarti Corps.name: Surge Forward
Namarti Corps.effect: You can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for friendly Namarti units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly Akhelian unit.

Soul-raid Ambushers.name: Fade Like Mist
Soul-raid Ambushers.activation: Once Per Turn, End of Your Turn
Soul-raid Ambushers.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin Infantry or Cavalry unit wholly within 3" of a terrain feature.
Soul-raid Ambushers.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up in reserve travelling the ethersea (see the ‘Raiders from the Deep’ ability).

heroic_traits.name: Hunter of Souls
heroic_traits.effect: This unit’s melee weapons have Anti‑Hero (+1 Rend).

heroic_traits.name: Nightmare Legacy
heroic_traits.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by an ability used by this unit to be the target.
heroic_traits.effect: Subtract D6 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

heroic_traits.name: Ancient Pride
heroic_traits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

artefacts_of_power.name: Dritchleech
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy Wizards while they are within 18" of this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Delicious Morsels
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Turn, Any Movement Phase
artefacts_of_power.effect: Heal (D3) each friendly Idoneth Deepkin Cavalry unit within this unit’s combat range.

artefacts_of_power.name: Armour of the Cythai
artefacts_of_power.effect: Other than the Companion weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks that target this unit have no effect.

Lore of the Deeps.name: Pressure of the Deep
Lore of the Deeps.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Deeps.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Lore of the Deeps.name: Steed of Tides
Lore of the Deeps.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Idoneth Deepkin unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Deeps.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

Lore of the Deeps.name: Arcane Corrasion
Lore of the Deeps.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Deeps.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

melee.name: Deepmare’s Fangs, Talons and Lashing Tails

abilities.name: Wave Rider
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Akhelian Royal Weapons for attacks that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Akhelian Paragon
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Akhelian Cavalry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Ensnared
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster or Cavalry unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Predators
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Allopex’s Ferocious Bite while it is within 6" of any damaged enemy units or while it is within 6" of any enemy units that had any models slain in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Lotann, Warden of the Soul Ledgers

abilities.name: Fount of Willpower
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Isharann units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Catalogue of Souls
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly Idoneth Deepkin units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Isharann Emissary.

abilities.name: Rise From The Depths
abilities.effect:
Set up this faction terrain either as 1 terrain feature consisting of 2 scenery pieces (that must be set up within 3" of each other) or as 2 separate terrain features. Set up each terrain feature wholly within friendly territory and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. After you have done so, it has been deployed.

If this faction terrain is set up as 1 terrain feature consisting of 2 scenery pieces, it has a Health characteristic of 14 instead of 7.

abilities.name: Guardians of the Deep
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly Idoneth Deepkin Infantry and Cavalry units while they are wholly within 6" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Biovoltaic Barrier
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target unit’s weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Galv-shields
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (5+) if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Biovoltaic Blast
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target, then roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in this unit.
abilities.effect: For each 4-5, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. For each 6, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Add 1 to each roll if there are more models in the target unit than this unit.

warscrolls.name: Akhelian Thrallmaster

abilities.name: Akhelian Fighting Stance
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit and any friendly Namarti units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

Way of the Riptide: Those units’ melee weapons have Crit (2 Hits).

Way of the Vortex: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target those units.

abilities.name: Thrallmaster
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Namarti Thralls unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Akhelian Raidmaster.

abilities.name: Sweeping Blows
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Lanmari for attacks that target enemy Monsters.

abilities.name: Soulnet
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Elathain Ill-fated is on the battlefield, pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Elathain's Lurelight
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, return a number of slain models to this unit equal to the roll.

melee.name: Leviadon’s Scythed Fins and Crushing Jaws

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Leviadon’s Scythed Fins and Crushing Jaws is 5.

abilities.name: Crushing Charge
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy Infantry unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target unit has more than 10 models. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Void Drum
abilities.effect: Friendly Idoneth Deepkin units have Ward (5+) while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Eidolon of Mathlann, Aspect of the Sea

abilities.name: Dormant Energies
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: Tsunami of Terror
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different visible enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for combat attacks that target those units until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Vengeful Waves
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit has not charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Tranquillity of the Abyss
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly Idoneth Deepkin units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Volturnos, High King of the Deep

melee.name: Uasall’s Fangs, Talons and Lashing Tails

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of Tides
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 other friendly Idoneth Deepkin units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: First Among Akhelians
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by other friendly Akhelian units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Cealith, the High King's Shield
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (3+) against mortal damage inflicted by Spell abilities, Prayer abilities or abilities used by Manifestations.

abilities.name: Hangman's Knot
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Lurelight
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different friendly Namarti units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets. You cannot pick the same unit to be the target of this ability more than once per turn. Make a lurelight roll of D3 for each target unit.
abilities.effect: On a 2+, return a number of slain models to the target unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Master of the Ethersea
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Make an Isharann ritual roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn:

Creeping Mist: Friendly Idoneth Deepkin units cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 12" of them.

Surging Stream: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly Idoneth Deepkin units. 

Spiteful Riptide: Each time an enemy unit uses a Retreat ability, after the effect of that ability has been resolved, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

abilities.name: Strike on the Move
abilities.effect: This unit can use Shoot abilities even if it used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Cyfar Compass
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Idoneth Deepkin units that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Finder of Ways
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Idoneth Deepkin unit that is travelling the ethersea to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Eidolon of Mathlann, Aspect of the Storm

melee.name: Spear of Repressed Fury and Crulhook

abilities.name: Crashing Upon The Foe
abilities.effect: This unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Retreat ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by Retreat abilities.

abilities.name: Pulled Into The Depths
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike‑last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Drench With Hate
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Idoneth Deepkin units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Cyreni of the Abyss
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Cyreni of the Abyss is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Phase Ink
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Cephanyr is on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.
